summary: Configuration for beta-two, a minimal machine with WireGuard VPN, audio services, and basic networking.
notes: Imports enable-wg lib, base config. Disables man documentation. Sets system.name and hostname to beta-two. Pipewire audio with alsa enable/support32Bit, pulse enable. Swapfile of 1024MB. SSH enabled. Networking hostname set.
reasoning: Lightweight config for a secondary machine, focused on VPN connectivity via WireGuard and audio handling with Pipewire. Suitable for headless or minimal use cases, ensuring secure remote access and multimedia support without heavy desktop environments.
